children.name: PieChart.vue
children.content:
<template>
    <canvas ref="canvasMatrix" width="100" height="100" />
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        props: {
            level: {
                type: Number,
                required: true
            },
            size: {
                type: Number,
                default: 25
            },
            background: {
                type: String,
                default: '#333333'
            },
            accent: {
                type: String,
                default: '#666666'
            }
        },
        mounted () {
            setTimeout(() => {
                this.drawCircles(this.size)
            })
        },
        methods: {
            /**
             * @returns {*}
             */
            getCanvas () {
                return this.$refs.canvasMatrix
            },
            /**
             * @returns {ImageBitmapRenderingContext | WebGLRenderingContext | WebGL2RenderingContext | CanvasRenderingContext2D | RenderingContext | OffscreenRenderingContext | OffscreenCanvasRenderingContext2D}
             */
            getCtx () {
                return this.getCanvas().getContext('2d')
            },
            /**
             * @returns {{width: *, height: *}}
             */
            getCanvasDimensions () {
                return {
                    width: this.getCanvas().width,
                    height: this.getCanvas().height
                }
            },
            /**
             * @param {Number} size
             */
            drawCircles (size) {
                const dims = this.getCanvasDimensions()
                const circleDiam = dims.width / (size + (size - 1) / 10)
                const ctx = this.getCtx()

                for (let i = 0; i < size; i++) {
                    for (let j = 0; j < size; j++) {
                        const x = circleDiam * 1.1 * i + circleDiam / 2
                        const y = circleDiam * 1.1 * j + circleDiam / 2
                        ctx.beginPath()
                        ctx.arc(x, y, circleDiam / 2, 0, 2 * Math.PI)
                        ctx.fillStyle = this.circleBackground(x, y, dims.width / 2, dims.width / 2, (dims.width * 1) / 2, this.level)
                        ctx.fill()
                    }
                }
            },
            /**
             * @param {Number} x Current x-dim
             * @param {Number} y Current y-dim
             * @param {Number} a Circle center x-dim
             * @param {Number} b Circle center y-dim
             * @param {Number} r Circle radius
             * @param {Number} level Percentage of circle to be coloured with a pie chart
             * @returns {string}
             */
            circleBackground (x, y, a, b, r, level) {
                if (!this.withinCircle(x, y, a, b, r) || !this.withinPie(x, y, a, b, r, level)) {
                    return '#ffffff'
                } else {
                    return this.background
                }
            },
            /**
             * @param {Number} x Current x-dim
             * @param {Number} y Current y-dim
             * @param {Number} a Circle center x-dim
             * @param {Number} b Circle center y-dim
             * @param {Number} r Circle radius
             * @returns {boolean}
             */
            withinCircle (x, y, a, b, r) {
                const sqrt = Math.sqrt(-1 * a * a + 2 * a * x + r * r - x * x)
                const y1 = b - sqrt
                const y2 = sqrt + b
                return !(isNaN(y1) || isNaN(y2) || y <= y1 || y >= y2)
            },
            /**
             * @param {number} deg
             * @returns {number}
             */
            alphaRad (deg) {
                return deg * (Math.PI / 180)
            },
            /**
             * @param {Number} x Current x-dim
             * @param {Number} y Current y-dim
             * @param {Number} a Circle center x-dim
             * @param {Number} b Circle center y-dim
             * @param {Number} r Circle radius
             * @returns {boolean|boolean}
             */
            withinPie (x, y, a, b, r, level) {
                const xTransl = x - a
                const yTransl = y - b
                const isFirstQ = x >= a && y <= b
                const isSecondQ = x >= a && y >= b
                const isThirdQ = x <= a && y >= b
                const isFourthQ = x <= a && y <= b
                let alphaRad
                let isT = false
                // a in linear
                let p1 = 0
                // b in linear
                const p2 = 0
                if (level === 0) {
                    return false
                } else if (level === 100) {
                    return isFirstQ || isSecondQ || isThirdQ || isFourthQ
                } else if (level === 50) {
                    return isFirstQ || isSecondQ
                } else if (level === 25) {
                    return isFirstQ
                } else if (level === 75) {
                    return isFirstQ || isSecondQ || isThirdQ
                } else if (level > 0 && level < 25) {
                    alphaRad = this.alphaRad((level / 100 * 360) - 90)
                    p1 = Math.tan(alphaRad)
                    isT = yTransl < (p1 * xTransl + p2)
                    return isFirstQ && isT
                } else if (level > 25 && level < 50) {
                    alphaRad = this.alphaRad(((level - 25) / 100 * 360))
                    p1 = Math.tan(alphaRad)
                    isT = yTransl < (p1 * xTransl + p2)
                    return isFirstQ || (isSecondQ && isT)
                } else if (level > 50 && level < 75) {
                    alphaRad = this.alphaRad(((level - 50) / 100 * 360) - 90)
                    p1 = Math.tan(alphaRad)
                    isT = yTransl > (p1 * xTransl + p2)
                    return isFirstQ || isSecondQ || (isThirdQ && isT)
                } else if (level > 75 && level < 100) {
                    alphaRad = this.alphaRad(((level - 25) / 100 * 360))
                    p1 = Math.tan(alphaRad)
                    isT = yTransl > (p1 * xTransl + p2)
                    return isFirstQ || isSecondQ || isThirdQ || (isFourthQ && isT)
                }

                return true
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<template>
    <canvas ref="canvasMatrix" width="100" height="100" />
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        props: {
            level: {
                type: Number,
                required: true
            },
            size: {
                type: Number,
                default: 25
            },
            background: {
                type: String,
                default: '#333333'
            },
            accent: {
                type: String,
                default: '#666666'
            }
        },
        mounted () {
            setTimeout(() => {
                this.drawCircles(this.size)
            })
        },
        methods: {
            /**
             * @returns {*}
             */
            getCanvas () {
                return this.$refs.canvasMatrix
            },
            /**
             * @returns {ImageBitmapRenderingContext | WebGLRenderingContext | WebGL2RenderingContext | CanvasRenderingContext2D | RenderingContext | OffscreenRenderingContext | OffscreenCanvasRenderingContext2D}
             */
            getCtx () {
                return this.getCanvas().getContext('2d')
            },
            /**
             * @returns {{width: *, height: *}}
             */
            getCanvasDimensions () {
                return {
                    width: this.getCanvas().width,
                    height: this.getCanvas().height
                }
            },

             * @param {Number} size
             */
            drawCircles (size) {
                const dims = this.getCanvasDimensions()
                const circleDiam = dims.width / (size + (size - 1) / 10)

                for (let i = 0; i < size; i++) {
                    for (let j = 0; j < size; j++) {
                        const x = circleDiam * 1.1 * i + circleDiam / 2
                        const y = circleDiam * 1.1 * j + circleDiam / 2

                        ctx.arc(x, y, circleDiam / 2, 0, 2 * Math.PI)
                        ctx.fillStyle = this.circleBackground(x, y, dims.width / 2, dims.width / 2, (dims.width * 1) / 2, this.level)
                        ctx.fill()
                    }
                }
            },
            /**
             * @param {Number} x Current x-dim
             * @param {Number} y Current y-dim
             * @param {Number} a Circle center x-dim
             * @param {Number} b Circle center y-dim
             * @param {Number} r Circle radius
             * @param {Number} level Percentage of circle to be coloured with a pie chart
             * @returns {string}
             */
            circleBackground (x, y, a, b, r, level) {
                if (!this.withinCircle(x, y, a, b, r) || !this.withinPie(x, y, a, b, r, level)) {
                    return '#ffffff'
                } else {
                    return this.background
                }
            },
            /**
             * @param {Number} x Current x-dim
             * @param {Number} y Current y-dim
             * @param {Number} a Circle center x-dim
             * @param {Number} b Circle center y-dim
             * @param {Number} r Circle radius
             * @returns {boolean}
             */
            withinCircle (x, y, a, b, r) {
                const sqrt = Math.sqrt(-1 * a * a + 2 * a * x + r * r - x * x)
                const y1 = b - sqrt
                const y2 = sqrt + b
                return !(isNaN(y1) || isNaN(y2) || y <= y1 || y >= y2)
            },
            /**
             * @param {number} deg
             * @returns {number}
             */
            alphaRad (deg) {
                return deg * (Math.PI / 180)
            },
            /**
             * @param {Number} x Current x-dim
             * @param {Number} y Current y-dim
             * @param {Number} a Circle center x-dim
             * @param {Number} b Circle center y-dim
             * @param {Number} r Circle radius
             * @returns {boolean|boolean}
             */
            withinPie (x, y, a, b, r, level) {
                const xTransl = x - a
                const yTransl = y - b
                const isFirstQ = x >= a && y <= b
                const isSecondQ = x >= a && y >= b
                const isThirdQ = x <= a && y >= b
                const isFourthQ = x <= a && y <= b
                let alphaRad
                let isT = false
                // a in linear
                let p1 = 0
                // b in linear
                const p2 = 0
                if (level === 0) {
                    return false
                } else if (level === 100) {
                    return isFirstQ || isSecondQ || isThirdQ || isFourthQ
                } else if (level === 50) {
                    return isFirstQ || isSecondQ
                } else if (level === 25) {
                    return isFirstQ
                } else if (level === 75) {
                    return isFirstQ || isSecondQ || isThirdQ
                } else if (level > 0 && level < 25) {
                    alphaRad = this.alphaRad((level / 100 * 360) - 90)
                    p1 = Math.tan(alphaRad)
                    isT = yTransl < (p1 * xTransl + p2)
                    return isFirstQ && isT
                } else if (level > 25 && level < 50) {
                    alphaRad = this.alphaRad(((level - 25) / 100 * 360))
                    p1 = Math.tan(alphaRad)
                    isT = yTransl < (p1 * xTransl + p2)
                    return isFirstQ || (isSecondQ && isT)
                } else if (level > 50 && level < 75) {
                    alphaRad = this.alphaRad(((level - 50) / 100 * 360) - 90)
                    p1 = Math.tan(alphaRad)
                    isT = yTransl > (p1 * xTransl + p2)
                    return isFirstQ || isSecondQ || (isThirdQ && isT)
                } else if (level > 75 && level < 100) {
                    alphaRad = this.alphaRad(((level - 25) / 100 * 360))
                    p1 = Math.tan(alphaRad)
                    isT = yTransl > (p1 * xTransl + p2)
                    return isFirstQ || isSecondQ || isThirdQ || (isFourthQ && isT)
                }

                return true
            }
        }
    }
</script>
